events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department as it matches the Software Engineer role requirements and skills.
Our recruiter John Smith has been assigned to your case and will be your primary contact throughout the hiring process.
The initial screening of your technical background and experience was completed successfully and you meet the essential criteria.
Thank you for responding promptly to our interview invitation; you have confirmed your availability for the next stage.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 10th at 2 PM UTC. The session will assess your software development and problem-solving skills.
Your technical interview was completed with positive results. The interviewers noted your strong coding abilities and system design knowledge.
The human resources interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 11 AM UTC to discuss cultural fit and compensation expectations.
You completed the HR interview successfully. The discussion covered your career goals and alignment with our company values.
We have sent you a formal job offer for the Software Engineer role, including details about salary, benefits, and start date options.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and have requested some clarifications regarding remote work policy and onboarding support.
You accepted the job offer formally and expressed eagerness to join our engineering team and contribute to upcoming projects.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and setup of development environments to ensure a smooth transition.
The hiring process is now officially closed and you are welcomed as a new member of the engineering team at our company.
